          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Storia degli inventori europei</string>
            <string language="en">History of European inventors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte der europäischen Erfinder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire des inventeurs européens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History de inventores europeus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία των ευρωπαϊκών εφευρετών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historia de inventores europeos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo Lo ha a che fare con inventori ed i loro paesi d'origine.</string>
            <string language="en">This LO deals with the inventors and their country origin.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">inventori</string>
            <string language="en">inventors</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses NIEDRIGE Abkommen mit den Erfindern und 
ihrem Landursprung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce BASSES affaires avec les inventeurs et leur 
origine de pays.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este negócios BAIXOS com os inventores e sua 
origem do país.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το LO εξετάζει τους εφευρέτες και την 
προέλευση χωρών τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este repartos BAJOS con los inventores y su 
origen del país.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfinder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inventeurs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inventores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εφευρέτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">inventores</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo LO può essere usato per imparare le nazionalità di famosi inventori. Gli studenti fanno un click sui nomi degli inventori e possono vedere di quale nazione essi siano. Si può usare in Storia o geografia ed anche nelle lezioni di lingua.</string>
            <string language="en">This LO can be used for learning about the nationalities of the well known inventors. Students click on the inventors' names and they see what contry they are from. You can use it for history or geography lessons and even for language learning.</string>
          </description>
